title: Ranked team, looking for; Mid Laner, Support and Marskman (ADC)
body: I'm looking to create a ranked team for people of any ELO to play with, jg and top are currently filled but we are still looking for a support adc and mid, any1 will be welcomed, unless you get really toxic and ruin the play environment. {{champion:32}}  want people who done flame and rage at the slightest mistake, like accidentally taking a kill, e.g. supp morg gets a kill Quinn wanted from using r.

replies.body: I would like to now state that the team is full, if any positions open up I will inform you all ty.

I'm keen. I like ADC and support most. Have been shying away from ranked a little, because I really want a team to play with (solo queueing can get really toxic and disheartening at times).
Am mature (26), not toxic or a ragequitter. Probably not the best player out there, but I always put in my 100% and research to get better.
Add me in-game if keen. "GreyHat" is my summoner name.
Hey, I added you in game :) My IGN is SammyCee123. I can play mid out of those three open roles. Cant play ADC or Support at all :)
added you ingame, mid lane pref but can also support
I would be keen to join, i am a silver 3, almost silver 2 mid laner/adc
